name: ripplet.js
description: Fully controllable vanilla-js material design ripple effect generator

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd-declarative && npm run build:es
scripts.build:umd-declarative: rollup -c -i src/ripplet-declarative.umd.ts -o umd/ripplet-declarative.js && uglifyjs -m -o umd/ripplet-declarative.min.js umd/ripplet-declarative.js
scripts.watch: echo Rollup watch crashes in cmd/PowerShell on windows. see https://github.com/rollup/rollup/issues/1739
scripts.verify: npm run verify:install && npm run verify:rebuild && npm run verify:open
scripts.verify:rebuild: npm run verify:clean && npm run verify:build
